pullrequest.title: Upgrade to fuel-tools1 and automatically update paths -> pull request #2800

content.raw: Good points. I think the cleanest solution would involve having a single entry-point to look for any kind of resource (meshes, textures, material files, models, plugins, worlds...). This should then look at local paths and only afterwards at online databases. I think classes like `physics::World`  shouldn't be worrying about where resources are coming from.
content.html: Good points. I think the cleanest solution would involve having a single entry-point to look for any kind of resource (meshes, textures, material files, models, plugins, worlds...). This should then look at local paths and only afterwards at online databases. I think classes like physics::World shouldn't be worrying about where resources are coming from.
